Our Product

Here at Olive2Oil we pride ourselves on quality, thats why our oil has never been anying sort of a silver medal. We wouldn't want to sell it to you otherwise. Quality makes all the difference, once you try our oil you wont be able to go back to supermarket brands.

The product

Get our oil

There are various places around the wellington region where you can pick up our Extra virgin olive oil off the shelf or if you'd prefure you can ordered it straight from us via this hand form below. Just fill in all the fields and we'll get in touch with the payment details.

Want to chat?

Here at Olive2Oil we'd love to hear what you have to say. If you have got something on your mind feel free to give us a buzz by filling out the form below. Also if you are interested I have our product in you shop let us know.
